messages.subject: raising money for school (for unschoolers)
messages.msgSnippet: Ah!  Speaking of those philosophy discussions.... This is sent to me from someone I don t know, who s a rabinical student in Israel, who reads my SCA stuff and
messages.messageBody:
Ah! Speaking of those philosophy discussions....
This is sent to me from someone I don't know, who's a rabinical
student in Israel, who reads my SCA stuff and has corresponded with
me about virtues. He's young and in the SCA in Israel. Crazy
SCA... some parts drive me crazy and some parts I love. But he
sent a homeschooling cartoon:

Sandra
===========================================================

Dear Sandra,

I was reading the Washington Post Express (the free metro version
handed out near train stations) today and saw a cartoon that made me
think of you. It was the Duplex. http://www.gocomics.com/duplex/
I thought you'd enjoy and figured you may not have otherwise read it.
--
Sincerely yours...

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
